metadata.title: CVE-2023-45935 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: Qt 6 through 6.6 was discovered to contain a NULL pointer dereference viathe function QXcbConnection::initializeAllAtoms(). NOTE: this is disputedbecause it is not expected that an X application should continue to runwhen there is arbitrary anomalous behavior from the X server.

criterions.comment: qt6-base package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
